Author: yeh1234gee
Text: One of my exs did this and I ended up resenting it so much I broke up with him. He would get mad at me cos he'd buy two pizzas and he'd end up eating both because I refused to eat. Honestly say to him that's its bothering you and that he could buy healthier foods that you feel less guilty eating.
